## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the text table hides empty cells. If empty cells are hidden, locations with empty cells allow the background of the enclosing block or text container to show through.

# hidesEmptyCells

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the text table hides empty cells.

## Declaration

```swift
var hidesEmptyCells: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the text table hides empty cells. If empty cells are hidden, locations with empty cells allow the background of the enclosing block or text container to show through.
title: hidesEmptyCells
